# aliyun_ess_tag (Resource)

`ess tag resource`

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "aliyun_ess_tag" "demo" {
  ess_id = "asg-id"
  tags = {
    "a" = "bb"
    "c" = "dd"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ess_id` (String) the ess group id
- `tags` (Map of String) the ess tags map
